subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer, who had surgery for a broken right wrist, had been one of Astana’s strongest riders. Meanwhile, Heinrich Haussler of Germany won Friday’s stage.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer, who had surgery for a broken right wrist, had been one of Astana’s strongest riders. Meanwhile, Heinrich Haussler of Germany won Friday’s stage.
